author: Chris Velazco
title: Apple iPad Pro 12.9 review: The rest is yet to come
description: There's an Apple promo video on YouTube right called "iPad Pro — Your next computer is not a computer" that's sitting pretty with over 22 million views as I write this. Another video, with more than three million views, features an old-timey voiceover explain…
content:
More like a laptop than ever
When I reviewed the third-generation iPad a year and change ago, I half-jokingly wrote this:
"I know there's zero chance of Apple listening to me, but I have to try. Hey, guys, can you please figure out how to make a trackpad wo… [+5606 chars]
